channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft to Cut 9,000 Jobs in Second Wave of Layoffs
Trump's Tax Bill Plans To Decimate Medicaid. For One Group, The Cuts Will Be Unspeakably Cruel.
X Goes Down: ‘Did Elon Finally Kill Twitter?’
Scientists stunned after finding remote island blanketed in dangerous material: 'Our findings are deeply concerning'
Australia cancels Kanye ‘Ye’ West's visa over Hitler song
Bryan Kohberger is due to appear in court to plead guilty in University of Idaho stabbings
Video shows airborne shark hitting surfer's face in Florida
item.description: Surfer Darren Kaye said he noticed the spinner shark before the collision, but thought nothing of it until the animal came flying at him.

item.title: Thousands of Philadelphia city workers on strike but judge orders some back to work
item.description: A strike being staged by nearly 10,000 city workers in Philadelphia has entered its second day

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: 'Diddy' not guilty of racketeering in split verdict
item.description: Hip-hop mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs is charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy.

item.title: WATCH: Man joins his wife as ‘Jeopardy!’ champion
item.description: Maine real estate agent Jason Singer, who won last night’s episode, is married to Susan McMillan, who took home the title in 2021.

item.title: Microsoft to lay off 4% of workforce in latest round of job cuts
item.description: The tech company is laying off roughly 9,000 workers in latest round of job cuts, after slashing 6,000 jobs in May.

item.title: New expedition will seek to locate Amelia Earhart's lost plane
item.description: An expedition to a remote and tiny island this fall will attempt to locate Amelia Earhart's plane​ in the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: Lululemon sues Costco, alleging the discount retailer copied its designs
item.description: Lululemon is accusing Costco of stealing from its "path-breaking" brand by selling dupes of its sweatshirts, jackets and pants.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: House considers president's megabill amid GOP divisions
item.description: After a nail-biter vote in the Senate, the House is taking up President Donald Trump's giant tax and immigration bill. But the weather could be a wild...

item.title: A day outside an LA detention center shows profound impact of ICE raids on families
LIVE: Sean 'Diddy' Combs not guilty of racketeering in split verdict: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs acquitted of sex trafficking, convicted on lesser charges
item.description: The verdict in the Sean "Diddy" Combs trial comes after the high-profile proceedings started in May.

item.title: In Idaho college town where 4 students were killed, relief and anger over Bryan Kohberger plea deal
item.description: Residents are expressing a mix of relief and anger in the small Idaho college town where four students were stabbed to death after the news that the m...
